name: Slimes Shooting Slimes
description:
Fight as a slime in an area against up to 3 other local slimes!

As you shoot your fellow slimes, you grow stronger. But watch out, or you'll become too large to move!

Traxdata: Lead Programmer

0x0ade: Programmer

Textil: Programmer

Vault Kid: Art, Music

Kammerdorn: Art, but real life got in the way :/

Made using Unity and Corgi Engine. Will happily share code with those who have bought the Corgi Engine.
